review: Best streaming stick option on the market. Unlike the FireTV stick, you can power it through your TV's USB (instead of plugging into the wall). Streams WatchEspn near flawlessly, much better than FireTv Stick.
author: Matthew H. Walker

review: Works great if you're not trying to cast Netflix from a iPhone. No other app has issues casting to my TV. It hangs up so frequently when trying to cast a Netflix I just unplugged it.  I called Netflix to ask for a fix and they blamed it on my bandwidth, which I have 100mb pipe.  My wireless router is in the same room 5-6 ft from the tv. Got tired of dealing with it and purchased the Roku 3, which is so much nicer.
